metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4074 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The jv_dump_term function in jq 1.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption and application crash) via a crafted JSON file. This issue has been fixed in jq 1.6_rc1-r0. It was discovered that jq did not perform sufficient bounds checking, resulting in unbounded resource consumption. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: jq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
